Attacks.Name: Lick
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Shadow Ball
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Night Shade
Attacks.Effect: Fixed damage equal to this character's Threat Level.

Superpowers.Name: Levitate
Superpowers.Effect: This character ignores terrain and other characters when moving.

Superpowers.Name: Hypnosis
Superpowers.Effect: The target character gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Dark Pulse
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Haunter character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
